Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    key,
    "Launch Pad", Navigate(LaunchPad, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "Brain Stash", Navigate(BrainStash, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "The Pantry", Navigate(ThePantry, ScreenTransition.Fade)
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
// "key" is the screen name passed in from the component
Switch(
    key,
    "Launch Pad",    Navigate(LaunchPad, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "Brain Stash",   Navigate(BrainStash, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "Client Depot",  Navigate(ClientDepot, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "The Pantry",    Navigate(ThePantry, ScreenTransition.Fade),
     "Becca Bot",    Navigate(BeccaBot, ScreenTransition.Fade)
  
)

Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(
    key,
    "Launch Pad", Navigate(LaunchPad, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "Brain Stash", Navigate(BrainStash, ScreenTransition.Fade),
    "The Pantry", Navigate(ThePantry, ScreenTransition.Fade)
)

If(
    CountIf(colCatPick, Value = ThisItem.CategoryValue) > 0,
    RGBA(240, 243, 226, 1),
    RGBA(44, 47, 37, 0.2)
)

With(
    { val: Text(ThisItem.CategoryValue) },
    If(
        CountIf(colCatPick, Value = val) > 0,
        RemoveIf(colCatPick, Value = val),
        Collect(colCatPick, { Value: val })
    )
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
With(
    { val: Text(ThisItem.Value) },    
    If(
        CountIf(colKBCatPick, Cat = val) > 0,
        RemoveIf(colKBCatPick, Cat = val),
        Collect(colKBCatPick, { Cat: val })
    )
)
If( CountIf(colKBCatPick, Cat = Text(ThisItem.Value)) > 0, RGBA(44, 47, 37, 1 ), RGBA(44, 47, 37,1 ))
If( CountIf(colKBCatPick, Cat = Text(ThisItem.Value)) > 0, RGBA(240, 243, 226, 1), RGBA(44, 47, 37,0.2) )

Rules.InvariantScript:
With(
    {
        picks: colCatPick,
        q: Lower(Trim(txtKBSearch_1.Text)),
        currentFolder: Last(colDocPanelCrumbs).Path
    },
    Filter(
        cmpDocLibraryPanel.FolderSource,
        !IsFolder,
        'Folder path' = currentFolder,
        IsEmpty(picks) || CountIf(picks, Value = Coalesce(Category.Value, "")) > 0,
        Len(q) = 0
            || StartsWith(Lower(Coalesce(Title, "")), q)
            || StartsWith(Lower(Coalesce('OData__ExtendedDescription', "")), q)
    )
)
